org.dejava.component.javaee.service

Interface GenericService<Entity>

  • Type Parameters:
    Entity - Any entity.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGenericController, AbstractGenericService

    public interface GenericService<Entity>
    Defines the expected interface of a entity service.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Entity addOrUpdate(Entity entity)
      Adds or update the persistent entity.
      Collection<Entity> addOrUpdateAll(Collection<Entity> entities)
      Adds or update all the persistent entities.
      Collection<Entity> getAllEntities(Integer firstResult, Integer maxResults)
      Gets all entities of the kind.
      Collection<Entity> getEntitiesByAttribute(String attributeName, Object attributeValue, Integer firstResult, Integer maxResults)
      Gets all entities with the given attribute value.

      Gets an entity by its id.

      Removes a persistent entity.

      Removes persistent entities.

    • Method Detail

      • addOrUpdate

        Entity addOrUpdate(Entity entity)
        Adds or update the persistent entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to be persisted.
        Returns:
        The persisted (and updated) entity.

      • addOrUpdateAll

        Collection<Entity> addOrUpdateAll(Collection<Entity> entities)
        Adds or update all the persistent entities.
        Parameters:
        entities - The entities to be persisted.
        Returns:
        The persisted (and updated) entity.

        Removes a persistent entity.
        Parameters:

      • removeAll

        void removeAll(Collection<Entity> entities)
        Removes persistent entities.
        Parameters:
        entities - The entities to be removed.

      • getEntityById

        Entity getEntityById(Object identifier)
        Gets an entity by its id.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The id of the entity.
        Returns:
        An entity by its id.

      • getEntitiesByAttribute

        Collection<Entity> getEntitiesByAttribute(String attributeName,
                                        Object attributeValue,
                                        Integer firstResult,
                                        Integer maxResults)
        Gets all entities with the given attribute value.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - The attribute name.
        attributeValue - The attribute value.
        firstResult - The first result that should be considered by the query.
        maxResults - The maximum numbers of results to be considered by the query.
        Returns:
        All entities with the given attribute value.

      • getAllEntities

        Collection<Entity> getAllEntities(Integer firstResult,
                                Integer maxResults)
        Gets all entities of the kind.
        Parameters:
        firstResult - The first result that should be considered by the query.
        maxResults - The maximum numbers of results to be considered by the query.
        Returns:
        All entities of the kind.
